TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RouteValueExpressionEditor extends System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor

Docs.summary: Provides properties and methods for composing a expression at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A visual designer host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], uses the RouteValueExpressionEditor class to compose a `RouteValue` markup expression.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object EvaluateExpression (string expression, object parseTimeData, Type propertyType, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object EvaluateExpression(string expression, object parseTimeData, class System.Type propertyType, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed

Docs.param: A expression to evaluate. The expression does not include the expression prefix.
An object that contains additional parsing information that is used to evaluate the expression.
The type of the control property.
A service provider implementation that is supplied by the designer host and that is used to obtain additional design-time services.
Docs.summary: Evaluates a expression and provides the design-time value.
Docs.returns: The value of the specified URL parameter if the expression evaluation succeeded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The visual designer uses the EvaluateExpression method to evaluate a `RouteValue` expression and to provide the design-time value for an associated control property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet GetExpressionEditorSheet (string expression, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet GetExpressionEditorSheet(string expression, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed

Docs.param: The expression string that is used to initialize the expression editor sheet. The expression does not include the expression prefix.
A service provider implementation that is supplied by the designer host and that is used to obtain additional design-time services.
Docs.summary: Returns an expression editor sheet for a expression.
Docs.returns: A instance that defines the expression properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The GetExpressionEditorSheet method returns an editor-sheet implementation for `RouteValue` expressions. The editor sheet for `RouteValue` expressions enables users to select a URL parameter. After users have selected the parameter, the editor-sheet implementation generates a `RouteValue` expression that is returned to the visual designer.
